title: Fix scroll-to-top on navigation/refresh and update footer contact information

requirements.text: Ensure the page always scrolls to the top (0,0) when the user navigates between routes via button/link clicks (including navigation triggered by Header and Footer buttons) and when the page is refreshed/reloaded. Implement this globally in the app layout/router layer so it applies to all pages.

quotes: WHEN EVER USER CLICK ON THE BUTTON IT WILL NOT START FROM THE TOP AFTER REFFERSING

acceptanceCriteria: From any scroll position on any page, clicking any in-app navigation button/link (e.g., Header menu items, Footer offering/solution buttons) navigates to the new route and the viewport is positioned at the top of the page.
Refreshing/reloading a page while scrolled down results in the viewport loading at the top of the page (not restoring the previous scroll position).
Behavior works on both desktop and mobile viewports across all existing routes in frontend/src/App.tsx.

requirements.text: Update the website contact information displayed in the footer Contact section to exactly: Head Office: Kanpur, India; Phone: +91 81124 38846; Hours: Mon - Sat, 10 AM - 6 PM; Email: official@solarsparkle.in. Use English labels and ensure formatting remains clean and responsive on mobile.

quotes:
AND UPGRADE THE CONTACT INFOR.  Head Office
Kanpur, India
+91 81124 38846
Mon - Sat, 10 AM - 6 PM
MAIL= OFFICIAL@solarsparkle.in

acceptanceCriteria: The Footer Contact section no longer shows the placeholder values (info@solarsparkle.com, +1 (555) 123-4567, etc.) and instead shows the provided Head Office location, phone number, hours, and email.
Email is displayed as "official@solarsparkle.in" (lowercase) and matches exactly.
Footer layout remains visually consistent with the existing design and does not overflow or break on small screens.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not modify the immutable authentication/actor hooks: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x) and frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts.
Keep all changes within the existing single React app and TanStack Router setup (no new backend services).
nonGoals: No changes to backend canister logic or data models.
No new pages or routes beyond addressing scroll restoration and footer contact content.
No third-party integrations (social links can remain as-is placeholders unless explicitly requested).
